<small>Aramaic form: [[H3916]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַ֫יְלָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַ֫יִל‎</span><sub>242</sub> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Gen.40.5|Gen 40:5]]</sup> ==night== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>15</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(ב)ללה‎</span>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לֵילָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> all = ***night***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***lîlâtu***</u></abbr>, ***evening*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB</sup>; meaning of √ dubious; form probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לילי‎</span>, and ending <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָ֯‎</span> radical, and not <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 127</sup> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Prol. 128</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:90»§ 90</sup>, 2. with R. [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. p. 57, R. 1</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַ֫יְלָה‎</span> [[Gen.19.33|Gen 19:33]] + 214 t. + 2 t. [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]. (see below); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָ֑יְלָה‎</span> [[Gen.1.5|Gen 1:5]] + 3 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַ֫יִל‎</span> [[Isa.16.3|Isa 16:3]] + [[Prov.31.18|Prov 31:18]]; [[Lam.2.19|Lam 2:19]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַיְלָה‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵיל‎</span> [[Isa.15.1|Isa 15:1]] (twice in verse); [[Isa.21.1|Isa 21:1]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵיל‎</span> [[Exod.12.42|Exod 12:42]]; [[Isa.30.29|Isa 30:29]] plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵילוֺת‎</span> [[1Sam.30.12|1Sam 30:12]] + 4 t.; construct ***id.***, [[Isa.21.8|Isa 21:8]] + 5 t.; — 

**1.** literally ***night***, opposed to day, [[Gen.8.22|Gen 8:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.1.33|Deut 1:33]] + very often (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם‎</span>); alternation of day and night divinely ordained [[Gen.1.5|Gen 1:5]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Jer.33.20|Jer 33:20]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.33.25|Jer 33:25]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיּוֺם עַדלֿ‎</span> [[Isa.38.12|Isa 38:12]]; [[Isa.38.18|Isa 38:18]] i.e within one whole day; as close of day, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדלֿ‎</span> [[2Chr.35.14|2Chr 35:14]] as time of sacred <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(לֵיל) חָג‎</span> [[Isa.30.29|Isa 30:29]] of suffering and weeping <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵילוֺת עָמָל‎</span> [[Job.7.3|Job 7:3]], compare [[Ps.6.7|Ps 6:7]]; [[Ps.77.3|Ps 77:3]] etc.; of pious desires, prayer, praise, meditation, etc (sometimes \|\| ***by day***) [[Isa.26.9|Isa 26:9]]; [[Job.35.10|Job 35:10]]; [[Ps.1.2|Ps 1:2]]; [[Ps.22.3|Ps 22:3]]; [[Ps.42.9|Ps 42:9]]; [[Ps.77.7|Ps 77:7]]; [[Ps.88.2|Ps 88:2]]; [[Ps.92.3|Ps 92:3]]; [[Ps.119.5|Ps 119:5]] (twice in verse), compare [[Ps.16.7|Ps 16:7]]; [[Ps.17.8|Ps 17:8]] of night-service in Temple [[Ps.134.1|Ps 134:1]] of sudden assault, or destruction, [[Isa.15.1|Isa 15:1]]; [[Jer.6.5|Jer 6:5]]; [[Obad.1.5|Obad 1:5]]; [[Job.27.20|Job 27:20]]; [[Job.34.20|Job 34:20]]; [[Job.34.25|Job 34:25]]; [[Job.36.20|Job 36:20]] divided into watches [[Ps.90.4|Ps 90:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵיל שִׁמֻּרִים‎</span> [[Exod.12.42|Exod 12:42]] see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁמר‎</span>; with number, denoting duration of time, ***forty days and forty nights*** [[Gen.7.4|Gen 7:4]]; [[Gen.7.12|Gen 7:12]]; [[Exod.24.18|Exod 24:18]]; [[Exod.34.28|Exod 34:28]]; [[Deut.9.9|Deut 9:9]]; [[Deut.9.11|Deut 9:11]]; [[Deut.9.18|Deut 9:18]]; [[Deut.9.25|Deut 9:25]]; [[Deut.10.10|Deut 10:10]]; [[1Kgs.19.8|1Kgs 19:8]] ***three days and three nights*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשָׁה לֵילוֺת‎</span>) [[1Sam.30.12|1Sam 30:12]]; [[Jonah.2.1|Jonah 2:1]] ***seven days and seven nights*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעַת לֵילוֺת‎</span>) [[Job.2.13|Job 2:13]] ; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲלוֺם הַלּ‎</span> [[Gen.20.3|Gen 20:3]]; [[Gen.31.24|Gen 31:24]] (both [[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Kgs.3.5|1Kgs 3:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְאֹת הַלּ‎</span> [[Gen.46.2|Gen 46:2]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶזְיוֺן ל‎</span> [[Job.20.8|Job 20:8]]; [[Job.33.15|Job 33:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶזְיֹנוֺת ל‎</span> [[Job.4.13|Job 4:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲלוֺם חֲזוֺן ל‎</span> [[Isa.29.7|Isa 29:7]] (compare [[Mic.3.6|Mic 3:6]] below) ; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּןלֿ‎</span> [[Jonah.4.10|Jonah 4:10]] (twice in verse) see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּן‎</span> 

**8.** b. Chiefly in adverb. phrase: — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּחֲצִי הַלּ‎</span> ***at midnight*** [[Exod.12.29|Exod 12:29]] + (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲצִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָצוֺת‎</span> b), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּתוֺךְ הַלּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.3.20|1Kgs 3:20]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאִישׁוֺן ל‎</span> [[Prov.7.9|Prov 7:9]] ; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַזֶּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּלּ‎</span> [[Exod.12.8|Exod 12:8]]; [[Exod.12.12|Exod 12:12]] ***on this night*** ([[BDB#P|P]]; the night of which one is speaking); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַהוּא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּלּ‎</span> ***on that night*** [[Gen.19.35|Gen 19:35]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) + often, ([[BDB#P|P]] only [[Num.14.1|Num 14:1]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוּא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּל‎</span> [[Gen.19.33|Gen 19:33]]; [[Gen.30.16|Gen 30:16]] so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלּ‎</span> alone [[1Sam.14.34|1Sam 14:34]], but strike out [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]], compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]; [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ליהוה‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלּ‎</span> ***to-night*** [[Gen.19.5|Gen 19:5]]; [[Gen.19.34|Gen 19:34]]; [[Gen.30.15|Gen 30:15]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Num.22.8|Num 22:8]]; [[Num.22.19|Num 22:19]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.2.2|Josh 2:2]]; [[Josh.4.3|Josh 4:3]] (both [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Sam.17.1|2Sam 17:1]]; [[2Sam.17.16|2Sam 17:16]]; [[2Sam.19.8|2Sam 19:8]]; [[Ruth.1.12|Ruth 1:12]]; [[Ruth.3.2|Ruth 3:2]]; [[Ruth.3.13|Ruth 3:13]], opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחָר‎</span> tomorrow [[1Sam.19.11|1Sam 19:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלּ‎</span> = ***this night*** just past, ***last night*** [[1Sam.15.16|1Sam 15:16]] (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלהַֿלּ‎</span> ***all night*** [[Hos.7.6|Hos 7:6]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּקֶר‎</span>), [[Exod.14.20|Exod 14:20]]; [[Exod.14.21|Exod 14:21]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Num.11.32|Num 11:32]]; [[Josh.10.9|Josh 10:9]] (both [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.16.2|Judg 16:2]] (twice in verse); [[Judg.19.25|Judg 19:25]]; [[1Sam.15.11|1Sam 15:11]]; [[1Sam.31.12|1Sam 31:12]]; [[2Sam.2.29|2Sam 2:29]]; [[2Sam.2.32|2Sam 2:32]]; [[2Sam.4.7|2Sam 4:7]] opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כלהֿיום ההוא‎</span> (of continuous action) [[1Sam.19.24|1Sam 19:24]]; [[1Sam.28.20|1Sam 28:20]]; [[Isa.62.6|Isa 62:6]], opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יומם‎</span> [[Ps.78.14|Ps 78:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכָללֿ‎</span> [[Ps.6.7|Ps 6:7]] ***every night*** (probably); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלהַֿלֵּילוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.21.8|Isa 21:8]] ***all the nights*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺמָם‎</span>) ; especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַיְלָה‎</span> ***by night*** [[Num.22.20|Num 22:20]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Josh.8.3|Josh 8:3]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.16.1|Deut 16:1]]; [[Num.9.16|Num 9:16]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) + 51 t.; of these [[Gen.14.15|Gen 14:15]] and [[Exod.13.21|Exod 13:21]]; [[Exod.13.22|Exod 13:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) + 25 t. opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺמָם‎</span>, covering all the time; otherwise [[Judg.6.27|Judg 6:27]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺמָם‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַיְלָה וָיוֺם‎</span> ***night and day*** [[1Kgs.8.29|1Kgs 8:29]]; [[Isa.27.3|Isa 27:3]]; [[Esth.4.16|Esth 4:16]] less often <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵילוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.16.17|Ps 16:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלּ‎</span> ***by night*** [[2Kgs.25.4|2Kgs 25:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> in \|\| [[Jer.52.7|Jer 52:7]]), [[Zech.1.8|Zech 1:8]]; [[Neh.4.16|Neh 4:16]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיּוֺם‎</span>) ; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּלּ‎</span> id., [[Jer.6.5|Jer 6:5]] + 18 t. (chiefly late; often opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּיּוֺם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺמָם‎</span>, etc.); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּלֵּילוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.92.3|Ps 92:3]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּבֹּקֶר‎</span>, [[Ps.134.1|Ps 134:1]]; [[Song.3.1|Song 3:1]]; [[Song.3.8|Song 3:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּלַיְלָה‎</span> [[Neh.9.19|Neh 9:19]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיוֺמָם‎</span> ); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּלֵיל‎</span> [[Isa.15.1|Isa 15:1]] (twice in verse) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּל‎</span> ***as at night*** [[Job.5.14|Job 5:14]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָהֳרָ֑יִם‎</span> ). 

**2.** figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁיתִי כַּלַיִל צִלֵּךְ‎</span> [[Isa.16.8|Isa 16:8]] simile of shadow of Zion as protection; more often in gloomy sense, of avenging calamity without divine guidance or comfort <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַיְלָה מֵחָזוֺן‎</span> [[Mic.3.6|Mic 3:6]] personal distress [[Job.35.10|Job 35:10]] judgment perhaps also [[Job.36.20|Job 36:20]] ([[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Da|Da]]; night of death [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]; 'unintelligible' [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהמִּֿלַּיְלָה מַהמִּֿלֵּיל‎</span> [[Isa.21.11|Isa 21:11]] i.e. what hour of the night of calamity is it? compare v[[Isa.21.12|Isa 21:12]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּקֶר‎</span>).
